channel.title: Rocket News
channel.description: Receive all the latest news about the Chatfuel Rockets!

item.title: Rockets sign Salihbegovic!
item.description: Looking for more depth on the offensive, the Rockets on Wednesday signed Kenan Salihbegovic. "Salihbegovic is a great blessing," the team's captain told our media division. "We were able to win a skilled player for us and I am confident, that he will help us score many goals in the future." Welcome, Salihbegovic!

item.title: White House announces own football team!
item.description: Last week the Chatfuel Rockets analyzed the team of the White House Warriors. The Chatfuel Rockets, together with the VB Stars, suggested improvements to the team's structure for better offensive and defensive moves and are curious how the WH Warriors will shape themselves in the future. Good luck, Mr President!

item.title: Advice from a pro-player!
item.description: Berkowitz published an interesting online article for guidelines on how to tackle even the toughest games! The CF Rockets loved his approach and whole-heartedly agree with his advice. Have a read yourself to step up your own game!
